lead_paragraph: (Reuters - Defending champions Portland began the new Major League Soccer season the way they finished the old one, beating Columbus Crew 2-1, on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Portland Open MLS Title Defense With Win Over Columbus
headline.main: Portland Open MLS Title Defense With Win Over Columbus
